backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining types and state for files, notes, folders, missions, authorization, and diagnostics, with health and diagnostic query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two mission‑move fixes to affected frontend hooks and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing many frontend components, hooks, and utilities with short functional descriptions.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation of a new Draft identical to Live v114 and validating full frontend parity.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and service-worker registration for the app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change-freeze notice explaining that no code changes are allowed post‑restore without explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, theme settings, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and offline fallback logic.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Guide outlining Chrome PWA installability requirements and verification steps for MyGallery.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming the frontend was restored to exact Live v114 behavior with verified components and flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring themes, providers, and intro-screen logic around the HomePage.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component displaying categorized initialization errors with retry, logout, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty file placeholder for a connectivity status component.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Displays a fixed decorative horizontal line near the bottom of the screen.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a blocked external file.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Provides a dialog for previewing files, performing actions like open, download, move, or delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads with progress tracking and speech‑to‑text support.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI and displays a folder icon.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog supporting creation, renaming, selection, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder browser with create, rename, delete, and select actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Interactive full-screen viewer for navigating, sharing, downloading, deleting, and organizing files with swipe and fallback behaviors.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, previews, bulk actions, and integration with the full-screen viewer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth dropdown, progress bar, and branding.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Two‑second fade-out intro splash screen showing the animated icon before the app loads.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot be opened, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button to authenticate using Internet Identity with loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission detail page supporting autosave, file/note viewing, task management, and external link handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task list editing before submission.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Renders a floating Missions button with animated icon, hover effects, and optional overlay/disabled states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Displays a full-screen missions list with swipe actions, mission creation, deletion, filtering, and navigation to mission details.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wraps children in a container intended for mobile-only layouts.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog allowing files or notes to be moved into a selected mission, showing mission list and handling mutations.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Full-screen dialog for viewing a note with actions for downloading, sharing, deleting, and sending to folder or mission.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes to folders or back to main collection, with performance logging and mutation handling.
Swipeable row component exposing edit/delete actions with pointer gesture handling and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a global upload progress bar showing percent and item count when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Renders an introductory screen with a target-themed SVG graphic, descriptive text, and a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages creation and lifecycle of the backend actor with retry logic, status tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides upload state management including progress coalescing, batch uploads, and legacy API compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once the actor is ready to speed up home screen loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and initialization logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Runs a callback when the app returns to the foreground if the user is authenticated and initialized.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer, indicating touch or mobile input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced autosave for mission title and tasks with change detection, mission switching resets, and queued saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, fetch, create, and update missions using a backend actor with targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes across folders and missions with concurrency-limited note creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for files and folders, including mission- and folder-specific queries plus folder creation and upload concurrency limiting.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Wraps browser speech recognition APIs to stream interim and final transcripts with error handling and language configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home page, handling authentication, data fetching, UI state, and dev-only smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines error messages and utilities to classify and serialize actor initialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Implements utilities for opening external URLs, downloading files, and sharing content.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer, preview, or download behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides previewability checks and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, determines completion status, and splits missions by state.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares task arrays safely with BigInt support to detect equality.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides a lightweight opt-in timing utility to measure operation durations and log results. Includes async timing helpers and a singleton instance.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation phases in development mode for debugging mission-related mutations.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only smoke tests for core backend flows like folder, mission, link, and note creation, and formats results. Collects successes or errors for each tested flow.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple concurrency limiter that queues promise-producing functions to enforce a max number of simultaneous executions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing and session storage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and radii, with support for dark mode and plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Defines the complete canonical list of frontend files for version 114 to support drift detection and reproducible builds.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state and scope, focusing on fixing immediate and correct transfer of items when moving from folders to missions.
